attributes.action: enforce financial penalties on the Child Support Agency when they fail to make an assessment..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been waiting 15months for a basic assessment from the CSA, and im not alone, ive been given no good reson as to the delay and have been treated with total dis-respect by the agency..they are allowed to do this as there is NO come back on them..how can agencies like Social Care be 'fined' for delays yet the CSA treat people disgracefully, create huge delays, make child suffer without being called to answer for this.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
